title: Optimize Landing Page for SEO
description: An SEO specialist needs to optimize a new landing page for a target keyword.

tasks.description: Analyze the landing page content and identify the primary target keyword.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the main keyword for the page.

tasks.description: Rewrite the page title and meta description to include the target keyword and be compelling for users.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces optimized and compliant title and meta description tags.

tasks.description: Ensure the target keyword is present in the H1 tag and within the first paragraph of the body content.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the page content to follow on-page SEO best practices.
